In the game, you command a party of chosen heroes who set out to change the world, one quest at a time. On your path you will explore the world, discover ancient secrets, and face down any enemy who stand in your path to glory through turn based tactical combat.

name: Corrupted Kingdoms
description:
You are the hero - or possibly villain - of this tale, originally on a journey to discover why your family was driven out of your home town, but quickly thrust into events beyond anything you could ever have imagined. As tensions rise between the humans and the mythical creatures that lurk just outside of sight, will you stand as a beacon of hope... or use your newfound power to bring the world under your control?
Meet dozens of fully-realised characters, purchase property and upgrade it, seek allies in your quest for justice or revenge and build relationships or tear them down to reveal fully animated and uncensored erotic scenes. With over 590 animations, more than 4000 images, unique music and sound effects and whole lot more in store!

name: Blind
description:
A short visual novel for NaNoRenO 2020.

Someone wakes with no memory and can't move their body or see anything. They try to understand who they are while the trauma of their past catches up to them.

Inspired by PSX sound novels with very little art but instead a focus on sound effects and music to build atmosphere.

name: 1930 Langman Tan
description: 1930 Romance Tan" is a female-oriented mobile game that combines "historical elements" & "original plot". In the game, the player will play the role of a college student who has accidentally traveled to 1930s Taipei city. In order to return home, the player must assist an amnesiac book spirit to retrieve memories until they can recall the coordinates to return home.

name: Rising Star
description:
Free to play NFT based music career game. Earn crypto and become a megastar!
Start as a lowly busker and work your way to the world tour collecting NFTs and earning crypto along the way. See you in Buskeria!

name: Legendary Mosaics: The Dwarf and the Terrible Cat
description: Legendary Mosaics - The Dwarf and the Terrible Cat invites you on a whimsical puzzle adventure. Something isn't right in the Enchanted Forest. A sinister spell has been cast by the Wicked Wizard, covering everything in eternal darkness. Team up with a cat and Dwarf duo and explore the depths of the forest! Save the fairies in Legendary Mosaics - The Dwarf and the Terrible Cat.

name: Escape Mystery: Alien Impact
description: Escape Mystery: Alien Impact is a point and click type room-escape game in a story-driven narrative game. Are you ready to escape? Let's start the amazing adventures of alien impact. The mission is behind you! Challenge yourself to complete the mission. The alien escape from the bio-lab as a prisoner. The mission is to impact the alien on the earth. Be Brave!! Smash everything, The loss of satellite communications put the space station in danger. Aliens must be using puzzle tricks, to do this smarts puzzles to recruit a group of brave aliens. During this mission, the alien has to overcome many obstacles to complete several dangerous and thrilling tasks. The lab environment and sound effect will keep the suspense and excitement at its peak. Tap and collect each item is to be important and need to perform it. The mission starts out easy and gets more & more difficult as your skill level improves. The alien may be transported to the earth only if there isn't another alien blocking its path. Investigate the space station, search for the alien and complete the puzzle in order to return back. There is an endless amount of excitement and objectives in alien escape to keep you waiting for a new unlock one by one.

name: Indie Gems Bundle - Nonograms edition
description: Piczle Cross Adventure takes the classic nonogram logic-puzzle and turns it into something never before experienced in the genre: a story-driven, RPG-style 2D graphical adventure! Follow our heroes Score-chan, Gig and professor Matrix as they tackle their most daunting challenge yet.

name: Gholazon X
description: Gholazon X is a goofy, over the top, 90s comics as fuck helper mod, ideal for huge maps/slaughterwads or folks who are still workin on their doom skills, and is compatible with most weaponsets, monster packs and mapsets.

name: Viking Heroes
description: Scale new heights of adventure as brothers Everand and Boromere and sisters Helga and Brunnhilde band together for the first time to pursue an evil sorcerer who has unleashed a flurry of devastating storms on Midgard!

name: Draw Around
description:
Can't draw? Awesome. 
 
Draw Around, or Passe un Dessin, is an online coop drawing game with a hint of Chinese Whispers. Art skills not required!

name: Sunwards
description:
This game is based on some dreams that always appear during the period of fighting with depression. The impression of some dreams is fragmented and remains in the memory. Finally, they are combined to form this unique world - the dream of Black Crow. There is a devil in everyone's heart. It's a fantastic and sad journey. When the spirit is on the verge of collapse, it is difficult to distinguish the dream from the reality. Maybe the dream will be better and more real than the reality. Maybe the dream will be a hellish scene, which confines but protects the heart.

Challenging dream world, born to death
In the dream, explore in the gloomy and dangerous spiritual world, through many obstacles, find the nightmare in the Black Crow's dream, and destroy them. Finally face the heart of Black crow. It is not terrible to die in a dream. What is terrible is the cycle of despair.

Action Elements and Skill Choices
Flexible action mechanism, so that the protagonist can fight freely, whether it is dodge or counterattack, can be handy. Rich skill combination, let the protagonist have more expansibility and fighting possibility. Explore dreams to acquire more skills, explore more skill combinations, and combine action mechanisms to find more effective ways to fight.

10 elaborate boss Wars
There is no doubt that this will be the climax of the action role-playing game. The 10 well-designed boss have different identity background and unique fighting style. Use your ability to find the most effective way to destroy boss. Finally, face the heart of the black crow and save him from the gloomy heart.

name: Aura Kingdom 2
description: Great remake of a classic MMORPG! Enjoy the satisfying MMO gameplay and stunning graphics on your PC! Embark on new adventure to the world Ramayan and screenshot every step of your journey. Summon Eidolons, establish tactics for party battles, and most of all... create YOUR legend as a Hero.

name: Sifting Thyme
description:
You’re the newest transfer student at Lincoln Culinary Academy, a private culinary school and the perfect start to your path towards finding your culinary calling. Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of food, business, and innovation throughout your school adventures. But you’re definitely not alone in this journey, as four gorgeous guys with culinary skills of their own await you to make your experience at Lincoln worthwhile.

Together, you will explore the world of food to forge relationships, engage new challenges, and aspire to make each other’s gourmet dreams come true.

An otome romance visual novel with unforgettable characters and adventures, and a perfectly delectable story for foodies across the globe.

name: Hard Rock Pinball
description:
Have fun, challenge yourself, defeat the bosses and test your luck in this pinball game to the sound of drums, guitars and synthesizers. What's up? liked? So ... Let's Rock!

Hard Rock Pinball is a game that seeks to bring all the experience of the old pinball machines, to the sound of guitars, drums and synthesizers, in addition to inserting a slot machine to test your luck and bosses that must be defeated.

name: Bleakshore
description: For the Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend 1 game jam

name: Active Neurons 2
description: Active Neurons 2 is a game that trains the player in spatial logical thinking. Your main task in the game is to collect enough energy to discover the 12 greatest inventions of mankind.

name: Dead Containment
description:
Taking On-Rails Shooters Off Rails
Dead Containment is an on-rails shooter inspired by classic arcade light gun games. Players fend off the undead as they race through a city under siege, blasting away the horrors that roam the streets.

Play solo or with a friend over online play, collect hidden pickups to boost your score, show off your skills in the stats screen and prove to your friends why you would survive a zombie outbreak.

Features:
- Solo and Online Co-op
- Light gun support
- Boss fights
- Multiple paths
- Rankings
- A classic arcade experience
- 1 credit mode

name: Chesscake
description: Classic board game in a computer version. A variant of English drafts. The goal of the game is to collect all enemy checkers.

name: Bock Bock
description: Bock Bock will let you face off against friends to decide who has the best eye for a fast chicken

name: Gado Fight
description: A pure fighting game

name: Fly Punch Boom: First Impact!
description: The DEMO for the WILDEST ANIME FIGHT, Fly Punch Boom! Fly super fast, smash your friends through skyscrapers and break the planet with one punch! Up to 4 players local & online. Now with workshop for INFINITE CHARACTERS!

name: Finding Teddy 2: Definitive Edition
description: Finding Teddy 2, is the new 2D nightmare adventure / action game with a pixel art retro twist. In this side scrolling platform adventure, you will need to upgrade your equipment and fight the evil forces of Anguis the Magician. Your mission will be complete when you’ll find your way out of this nightmare.

name: 来上大学吧！
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Slayers
description: Zombie Slayers is all about staying alive as long as you can. With plenty of weapons and defence options available you will face increasing amounts of zombies trying to end your career as a slayer. So, how long will you survive? Including playing as zombies (multiplayer-only).

name: Drift Alone
description: Feel the motion. Drift Alone is a drift racing indie game. The game focuses on simple controls and fun simcade style driving physics. Throw your car trough corners and get the best driftpoints to beat the game. Have fun and keep your car on the road!

name: Circle Empires Rivals
description: Circle Empires Rivals is a fast-paced multiplayer RTS where you and your friends will take control of your own tiny kingdoms and conquer a world made of circles. Each one is overflowing with enemies to fight, monsters to hunt and loot to horde - but watch out... Friends can quickly become rivals!

name: Project DeepWeb
description: Welcome to the DeepWeb. Here you can take off your mask and show yourself. Murders, drugs and perversions — here you can find everything you want. So breath in toxic gases and relax — the Silent House awaits new guests. It's a showtime.

name: Jiu Xiao
description: Sin descripción

name: Speed Builder
description:
Speed Builder is out for mobile! Endless running town-builder mobile action - the leaderboards have opened - keep on running keep on building! 
 
Global warming is upon us! We were warned but did not listen... Build to keep your town alive! Make sure your hungry villagers stay well supplied, and gather resources as you flee disaster! Fight the terrain as you build bridges to cross pits, demolition factories to clear the way, and level up your buildings at the science lab! Got past the fire? Great, now dodge the meteors, outrun the tornado, or... are those zombies?!?!?!?!?! 
 
Features: 
 
- action packed gameplay - a town builder and a runner in one! 
- town building on the fly! A variety of buildings - upgrade them for a more effective town! 
- quirky art style, lots of villagers, disasters and bandits- 
- did we mention bandits? Get rid of them or they will steal your precious resources! 
- loads of achievements, leaderboards and new villagers to unlock... 
 
This one’s a pressure cooker! See who can outrun the most disasters and go for the longest! Keep on running, keep on building!

name: Area 86
description:
Area 86 is a smooth physics-based puzzle and exploration game set in space. 
Control your robot in an interactive environment. 
Find, combine, activate, pick up and throw different objects to solve puzzles.

name: Kards: The WWII Card Game
description: Kards, The World War II Card Game, combines traditional CCG gameplay with innovative mechanics inspired by classic strategy games and real battlefield tactics. Take command and challenge other players in grand-scale warfare on the ground, air, or seas.

name: Stranglehand
description: Use your amazing fist to eliminate personal demons! If your outstretched hand touches a demon points are awarded. Greater awards are given if the demon is eliminated while the arm matches its color. Demons who touch your arm will do one point of damage to your health. If all six hearts are gone so are you! Only one arm can appear on-screen at a time. Fully retract your arm to enable the opposite appendage. You can change your off-screen arms color by pressing the FIRE button. Occasionally a star will appear that randomly changes your current arms color and awards bonus points. At certain intervals the demons will begin to move faster.

name: Call of Duty 4: Survival Mode
description: Call of Duty 4: Survival Mode is a modification for Call of Duty 4 singleplayer that aims to bring Modern Warfare 3 Survival Mode mechanics to Call of Duty 4.

name: Delirium
description: A psychological game about hardships of depression, life, being stuck, enraged and unable to fight. Unable to find the reason to continue and touches the dark side: The rage, hate, denial and definitely the wish for it to stop and for you to give up... But that's the easy way that leads nowhere...

name: Manor of Mystic Courtesans
description: Manor of Mystic Courtesans This is a place to find partners of every race, gender, and alternate dimension. Gorgeous artwork, seductive partners, and a plethora of extraordinary scenarios come together to make the most wild and lascivious adult novel game on Steam to date!

name: Trendpoker 3D: Free Online Poker
description: Play Online Poker without restriction or cost! Compete with community, your friends or family play this truly free Texas Hold'em Poker.

name: Amagami Mario Kart
description: Hack of Mario Kart 64. Change all characters replaced with characters from Anime Amagami and Change some textures.

name: Quiet Manor
description: Made for the Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend jam.

name: Lizard Quest
description:
Help out a tiny community of lizards and friends by doing small favors for them

Gather musicians to start a band, clean a dusty home, find a healthy outlet for an angry scorpion, and many more!

name: Tiredspace
description: Tiredspace is a game made in RPG Maker VX Ace that follows the story of Cola, a girl from Earth who deals with agoraphobia, her therapy robot Bocks, and Mocha, a girl from The Moon whose job is to replace the stars in the sky.

name: DJMax Respect V: Groove Coaster Pack
description: DJMAX RESPECT V GROOVE COASTER DLC!! Now enjoy the songs of GROOVE COASTER in DJMAX RESPECT V.

name: DJMax Respect V: Trilogy Pack
description: DJMAX RESPECT V - TRILOGY PACK! Now enjoy the songs of DJMAX TRILOGY in DJMAX RESPECT V.

name: Fallout 76: Tricentennial Pack
description: Emerge fully prepared and patriotically styled in the new American frontier.

name: Solos
description:
Solos is a puzzle bullet hell with "paper style" graphics.
Practically you'll have to create your own bullet hell, by avoiding bouncing bullets you'll shoot trying to hit all screen elements.

name: Fireside Hero
description: Fireside Hero is a compact strategy with an old-school look and a puzzle twist! Can you find and defeat five legendary monsters in twenty days? Plan your moves carefully - the lair may be right in those woods! Buy rumors, hire adventurers, explore the map, and win tactical combats.

name: Pitit Bac
description:
The good old Categories word game in a simple, fast, clean and real-time version. You can either play with the classic categories or write your own to open up a whole new game where players have to come up with ideas in crazy categories! Suggestions are available if you run out of ideas.

Players are given a letter and have to come up with something (a word or phrase) that fits each category within the (configurable) time limit. The first player to find something for all categories ends the round. Then all players vote on the other players' answers to determine if they agree with the propositions.

Valid answers are worth 10 points, unless someone else has also answered the same thing (in which case it is half of that). Invalid answers score nothing. These scores can be configured.

Available in English and French. No account needed, jut click the link and play.

name: Voxel Horizon
description: Create your own voxel world! Collaborate with your friends at your own level! The battle over destructible terrain!

name: Love Rewind: A Magical Time Travel Romance
description: What would you do with a second chance at life?

name: In Peaceful Days
description: Can you make the perfect teatime date?

name: Ashimeyama
description: Discover Ashimeyama.

name: Smalls Island Woes
description: Go to work, the lighthouse won't fix itself.

name: Cafe in the Clouds
description:
Cafe in the Clouds is bite-sized visual novel with point-and-click elements. The game features wholesome WLW content and a bonus ending for getting a 5-star dish!

When townsfolk are troubled by their daily lives, their imaginations run free as strange dreams envelop them in an uneasy sleep. Those with particularly vexing dreams may seek the mysterious assistance of dream eaters with hopes of having their anxieties eaten away. Entering the worrisome dreams of afflicted clients, Somnia and Remerie investigate the roots of their clients' torment, hoping to create a dish out of the materialized anxieties.

name: Etheldia Pepper
description: Etheldia Pepper is a monster taming RPG inspired by titles such as Pokemon and Final Fantasy. With sixty species of characters to recruit and open ended progression letting you choose which elder to fight and when, Etheldia is a short and sweet game with almost infinite replayability.

name: Doubles Hard
description: Doubles Hard is a unique puzzle game taking place in a three-dimensional arena. The player's task is to collect diamonds while avoiding boulders falling from above and other elements. You also need to run from opponents, which makes difficult for the player to pass through the game stages. There are several different types of blocks in the game that make up the board.

name: Super Cube Attack
description: Super Cube Attack is an action-filled minimalist twin-stick arena shooter. Blast your way through randomly generated levels with a variety of different unlockable weapons.

name: This Discord Has Ghosts in it
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Mission 2: Blood Count
description: Transylvanian undead? SS Cultists? These are the least of your problems in this brand-new campaign mission for Zombie Army 4. Break into an abandoned castle, unravel the mysteries of the occult and drill deep into the crypt's darkest secrets.

name: Impulse Control
description: Realistic building destruction meets personality quiz! Squash the meanies using skill and wits to unlock your unique personality profile. The levels feature challenging structures that won't fall down easily.

name: Thrice in a row
description: Thrice in a row is a logic game for creating chains of identical elements. The goal of the game is to put in a row from 3 identical elements, get points and go to the next level There are also bonuses. There are 28 different levels available.

name: Heavenworld
description: Heavenworld is an open world adventure game mixing role playing, survival and management with NPC survivors. Each game is unique and managed by a game master who influences events. A powerful map editor is also available.

name: Probe
description:
A challenging 2D block breaker featuring arcade elements and a modern spin on the popular retro game. Destroy data blocks and galactic enemies using only your probe, bullets and power ups but don't lose your ball to the void. Do you have what it takes to reach the end of the universe?

Features:
-50 Unique and challenging levels
-6 Power-ups to combine and utilize
-XBOX Controller Support
-80+ Steam Achievements
-Gameplay Statistics (In-Game)
-Steam Leaderboards and Scoring System

name: Fallout 76: Wastelanders - Deluxe Edition
description: Bethesda Game Studios welcome you to Fallout 76, the online multiplayer role-playing game. Work together, or not, to survive.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Collector's Edition
description: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour base game features an authentic career mode where you work your way up to an elite angler. Compete against over 100 of the best anglers on the planet including Ali Hamidi and Scott Martin across Carp, Bass and Predator fishing. Unlock sponsorship offers, gain career earnings and social media followers.Custom multiplayer allows you to set the rules as you take on friends online. Choose different options such as the number of rounds, length of match and catch species. Participate in online tournaments that form the Dovetail Fishing League to try and earn the coveted title of ‘Angler of the Month’.

name: Journey to the Savage Planet: Hot Garbage
description: Your new mission: Scout out the proposed home of a new Kindred waterfront resort 'Boomerdale'. Uncover the source of some mysterious pollutants, meet some new robotic adversaries, gather some fresh new upgrades (infinite stamina!) and report your discoveries back to Kindred Aerospace.

name: Saturn Quest: Shadow of Planetus
description: Saturn Quest: Shadow of Planetus is a shameless 8-bit style clone of Shadow of the Colossus! You are Captain Navigator. Fight the evil minions of Planetus! Save Saturn! Save Galaxy!

name: Amber Time
description: Amber world, feel the desire of money together! Free role-playing games will eventually be rich.

name: Peekaboo Collection - 3 Tales of Horror
description: Three horror games. Three different stories exerting you into dark twist, forcing you confront face to face with the creatures that lurk there.

name: Fallout 76: Wastelanders
description: In Fallout 76: Wastelanders, people are now coming back to West Virginia. Two vying factions are struggling to gain the upper hand as the secrets of West Virginia are revealed. The Settlers have come to find a new home, and the Raiders have come to exploit them. Embark on a new quest for the Overseer, forge alliances with competing factions, and uncover the truth of what's hidden in the mountains.

name: Farmtale
description: Build your unique farm from one chicken and shape your own adventure! Hire farmers for management and improve through questing, leveling, upgrades and items. The ultimate sandbox clicker game!

name: Eternal Radiance
description: Eternal Radiance is an action role-playing game about a squire named Celeste who begins a journey to prove herself worthy of becoming a true knight.

name: Blue Time
description: Explore each level and decide what happens to each space station. Help figure out the past to rewrite a new future.

name: Receiver 2
description: Receiver 2 simulates every internal part of each firearm based on manufacturer schematics and gunsmithing resources. Learn exactly how each sidearm works, including how to load and unload them, clear malfunctions, and operate their safety features.

name: Industries of Titan
description: Create a sprawling industrial city. Compete with the other Great Houses of Titan for resources, territory, and power. Do battle with ships, technology, influence, or the sheer productive power of your factories. Stake your claim to the Industries of Titan in this innovative sim/strategy game!

name: Agricola Revised Edition
description: Enter the life of medieval farmers! Enhance your farms to stone houses, breed your animals and stack food before the cold winters! So prepare yourself to plow, till and harvest your fields in the official digital adaptation of the acclaimed board game!

name: Idle Robots
description: Have you ever dreamed about programming your own robot from scratch? Build it step by step choosing the best parts for it, becoming every step closer to a great robot tycoon feeling? Well, now it’s more possible than ever. Give it a try and figure out how it gets created within the idle game.

name: Kairos
description:
Due to a sudden siege in the Sky Realm, Kairos, the goddess of chances, is forced to leave the Sanctuary and her brother, Chronos, the god of time. This causes the outbreak of monsters and create havoc in the flow of time.
In order to rescue Chronos and restore time, she has to find a way to solve the time crisis in Gaia.
On the other hand, Kainan is an amnesiac boy who found himself unable to remember anything. The only clue he has is a strange sword with strange powers.

name: Harmful
description: Made in 2 days for Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend.

name: Marshmallow
description: Marshmallow is a Japanese Yume Nikki Fangame created by Hokotate Makoto in RPG Maker XP.

name: Defying Heaven's Will
description: A BL murder mystery in xianxia setting!

name: Tony Hawk's Existential Nightmare
description: A love letter to the sport of skating, Tony Hawk's Existential Nightmare explores the decisions made along one skater's path to becoming legendary!

name: Remember Places?
description: You are locked inside. The only thing keeping your mind together is your AI best friend. Most places are just a memory to you now.

name: The Undying Beast
description: There was a flash of light, a choir of glass, and the sound of sirens approaching. Then for what seemed like eternity, a black hollow void. Suddenly you found yourself within a new plane. Dead trees and fog is all that surrounds you. You hear no birds or signs of life, but strange cackles and moans sound from the distance. And then you notice out of the corner of your eye you may not be alone here.

name: The House in the Woods
description: You are lost in a seemingly endless forest. Heavily inspired by the Blair Witch Project.

name: The Witchling Marjolaine
description: The Witchling Marjolaine is a visual novel game where you play a courier trying to deliver a package with just a photo to go on.

name: Ragnarok: The Lost Memories
description: Ragnarok: The Lost Memories, the follow-up to Ragnarok Online, is finally here! Ragnarok: The Lost Memories brings back all the nostalgia and classic game experience of the original. You can now enjoy the Cinematic Newtro RPG experience on your mobile device! Experience a storyline never before seen in the Ragnarok series. Choose your own path as you unlock the story and truth in Ragnarok: The Lost Memories. It will keep you engaged and wanting to know more about what happens next. Play at your own pace without feeling pressured to keep up. This is an adventure RPG, so expect to face challenges to beat the monsters, clear dungeons, and battle bosses to move forward with your story. A free to play adventure strategy game with a card battle system and character collection system!

name: Table Trenches
description: In Table Trenches, your table transforms into the battlefield! Grab a friend, scan your space, and battle it out, wherever you are. You'll deploy your forces, capture towers, and fight to the last in this real-time tactics game, designed for AR. Smash the enemy with Logan's mighty walkers, or melt their towers to the ground with Mei's devastating flame tank - the choice is yours. The player with the most towers left standing will win the day!

name: Tower of God
description: Tower of God is a turn-based game where you progress through the stage by catching enemies and gaining experience. There are 11 stages, 30 to 50 turns for each stage, and a boss comes out at the end.

name: Dragon Storm
description: Explore the island. Solve puzzles. Try to survive until you understand how to get out of here.

name: Unko Warriors
description:
Unko Warriors are here!
Is everyone ready?
The ultimate Ice cream game is complete!
Can you survive this battle?
Let's rock and roll!

name: VHS, 1986
description: A short horror game about a box of VHS tapes and a caller that doesn't want you to watch them.

name: Vaccine
description: Heal the sick, save the world! You will master simple levels in an addicting and challenging missions to save the world!

name: Carcavas
description: An atmospheric exploration game.

name: Frontier Diver: Aquatic Research Simulator
description:
Control a high-tech submersible as you search the ruins of a past civilization for new forms of life.

Made for Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend 1

name: Rashomon
description:
A short mood vignette/love letter to Kurosawa. 
 
See a story framed through three perspectives and attempt to piece together the true version of events.

name: 12 Labors
description: A short game about working your way up to an apology.

name: Winterlore I
description: Legend has it, that after God created the world, he scattered the crumbs left from his bag of miracles in the place that is now Moroi Springs. The land began to be inhabited by strange creatures to balance out the good and the bad in the world. Follow the story of young Ozana, as she embarks on a quest of self-discovery and healing after her beloved grandmother passed away.

name: Full Service Shop
description:
It is the year 20XX, and the needs of every single person you know are being exceeded.

Your top-notch, free healthcare includes cyborg parts. Everyone's does.

And you're due for an upgrade.

name: Disc Party
description: Disc Party is an online multiplayer disc golf arcade game. Compete with your friends on windy, procedurally generated islands and find out who's the best disc golfer!

name: Choujirou
description: Made in 48 hours for the Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend 1 Jam.

name: Ultimo Reino 2
description: Time of guilds, wizards, warriors, blacksmiths, tailors, scribes, alchemists, woodworkers, animal tamers, brewers, traders, traitors and murderers. The Ultimo Reino II begins!

name: Slash Roll
description: After slaying some spire, the taverns of Slash Roll are the ideal place to rest and play this dice pouch-building rogue-like with original mechanics.

name: Fighters' Glory
description: Fighters' Glory, a 3d-style weapons based fighter. 10 warriors compete for fame and fortune!

name: DragonRide VR
description: Dragon Ride VR is an interactive fantasy dragon experience designed to immerse you into the magical world of land, sea and air. Choose from a variety of smooth, fast and wild rides or opt in for some fun shooting games to capture the highest score!

name: Goblin Times
description: In this joyful Steampunk world, Goblins are the absolute dominators. They have their own ways of living. Money and power is what makes this world go around and also every goblin’s ultimate pursuit. Some goblins who are good at making money become leaders of the pack.

name: WGT Golf
description: Experience iconic golf courses like Pebble Beach, St Andrews and Wolf Creek in the most realistic free golf game, now available on PC, Mac and Steam. Connect with millions of players all over the world!

name: Harem Girl: Evie
description: Enjoy some sexy puzzle action in this relax-alot, 'one handed' puzzle game.

name: Super Nothing World
description:
The gameplay is fun and simple, but varied.

There are 3 worlds: standard, platforming, and kaizo. Players can choose which worlds they want to play. Also there are optional secret levels: cape, water, motor skills, and more. These levels don't unlock more levels, and they aren't necessary to see the credits. Also, there are many fast strats built into the levels to reward continued play.

name: Luna Sonata
description:
Vampire, with his dangerous charm; Werewolf, who's big, fluffy and cute; Hunter, the guy you can always count on; Doctor, a smart man with a warm heart.
Who will be the man that will move your heart?

Go on dates to unlock CGs, increase affinity and unlock good endings!

name: Harem Girl: Isabella
description: Harem Girl: Isabella is a simple puzzle game in which your goal is to swap tiles and complete each illustration.

name: Tomato Clinic
description: Tomato Clinic is looking for humans interested in taking a tour of a blood donation clinic! Learn a few things about vampire life and vampire culture, and if you want, you can even donate blood at the end of the tour.

name: Dear Devere
description: A romance/mystery visual novel set in 1930s Scotland, told through a letter correspondence.

name: A Night Train to the Forest Zone
description: A good chance to stretch your legs.

name: The Missing Locksmith
description: The Missing Locksmith is an alternate reality game that sees you use real world tools to delve through the lives of three thieves.

name: Distortion Nation
description:
Distortion Nation is about Reverie, a 24 year old woman who's starting her day in a really bad shape, with a eye that's severely hurt and a arm that might be broken.

Also she's a vampire.

So what will she do? Ask her two girlfriends for help? Try so solve her problems by herself? Learn to open up to others?

---

A short visual novel about learning how to accept help from those closest to you.

Features:
- 5 Choices
- Original Artwork
- Ambient soundtrack
- LGBTQ+ Cast

name: SpaceFoes
description: A space shooter inspired by old school games. You set the order of the levels, get new weapons and upgrades. Each stage has a boss and a sub-boss with unique skills and challenges.

name: Utopias: Navigating Without Coordinates
description:
Utopias: Navigating Without Coordinates is a videogame network of nine worlds - each one a personal utopia developed by a member of AAA collective.
Is a collective utopia possible?

name: The Chronicles of Robin Hood - The King of Thieves
description: Join forces with Robin Hood in this thrilling match3 game...! Help Robin Hood and the Merry Men in their quest to take down the Sheriff of Nottingham!

name: Two Days to the Race
description: Two Days to the Race is a text adventure game that you can play on your vintage computers. A text adventure is a game where all the interaction takes places with textand you instruct your alter ego by typing command at a prompt. The rest is done by your fantasy!

name: Little Necromancer
description:
Little Necromancer is a puzzle adventure game inspired by classics like "Adventures of Lolo" or "Ghosts'n Goblins".

Help Mortimer, a necromancer apprentice, to travel to the great Necropolis. Resurrect the dead ones along his pilgrimage. But beware! They know no more master.

name: Echoes of Nocturnal Chords
description: About the game: On a quiet midnight, a famous girl suddenly disappears unexpectedly. The protagonist followed the clue obtained at the girl's house all the way to the back of the mountain, but when they met, something strange happened ...

name: Bendy Royale
description: Bendy Royale is a fan-made playable version of the April fools troll game trailer with the same title.

name: Easy puzzle: Bridges
description: Easy puzzle: Bridges is a logic game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture.

name: Number 94
description: A short experimental horror game about infra-red and the dangers beyond our perceived color spectrum.

name: Save Her From the Zombies!
description: You're trapped in a mansion infested with zombies... Will you be able to protect the girl you love from certain death?!

name: Aglet: The Sneaker Game
description: Aglet is a geo-location, digital sneaker collecting game with a web 3 layer that introduces our players to NFTs. We have a playable map of reality which allows our players to explore the world around them.

name: Cream and Cheese in Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A ROM hack that swaps Sonic for Cream and Cheese (from Sonic Advance). Cream can fly like Tails, spindash and use Cheese to attack enemies remotely.

name: GG Date Me
description:
Live out your progamer fantasies in this slice-of-life dating sim set in the exciting world of professional e-sports.

Choose one of four unique and charming characters to date and relegate the others to lesser roles in your life whether they like it or not.

name: Box: Boxing
description: Box: Boxing is a multiplayer virtual reality boxing game with action filled gameplay and unique graphics. Fight against the CPU or others players in the craziest scenarios you've ever seen and become the champion of the Box:Boxing world!

name: Brain You Later
description: Get a taste of how it feels to live as a Consumer in The Architect’s city, surrounded by all of your favourite Products.

name: Jumpin' Jupiter: Prelude
description: In the future, the last cups of tea have have been scattered across the solar system. Our heroine, Jupiter, is on a mission to get them back at all costs!

name: Surprise Mechanic: The Gaming Trivia
description: Welcome to Surprise Mechanic, the trivia game focused in the gaming industry. Test yourself and your friends with questions about the gaming industry with a huge variety of themes on the matter.

name: Kurenkisho Quolta Amadeus EG
description:
A strong transforming heroine gets caught in cruel traps and endures erotic attacks! 
And if she gets defeated, the monsters get to have their way with her...

name: Gun Rounds
description: A game about a small, squishy person battling their way through swarms of enemies. A turn-based shooter with roguelite elements, Gun Rounds will challenge your tactics, sharpshooting skills, and reflexes!

name: Lusitania
description: Welcome aboard the RMS Lusitania, a luxurious ocean liner sunk by a German U-boat during World War 1. Immerse yourself in this detailed unique experience of how this great liner met its final moments.

name: Regola
description: A first-person game that uses a keyboard and mouse to block evil spirits and reassure girl.

name: Pop Star Debut
description: An edited fan translation of the Nintendo Family Computer game Idol Hakkenden. This game seeks to re-translate the game as it may have been translated by people like Ted Woolsey did in the late 80's and early 90's, with less emphasis on accuracy and more on localization.

name: Love the Game
description:
Love the game is a semi-autoclicker unlockable type of game!
For every space button pressed over a passing civilian, your love meter increases. hit target goals to unlock wacky costumes and bonuses to help increase your love points.

name: Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Tycoon
description: Live your pizzeria dreams in this FNaF Pizzeria Tycoon game!

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon + Expansion pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Mini Words: Top Movies
description: The Top 100 Movies. You know them and you love them. Test your knowledge about the highest-grossing films of all time in “Mini Words: Top Movies”, a unique mix of logic puzzle, word search and trivia.

name: Vestigial
description: Sometimes, nightmares follow us into the waking world, leaving us with only pieces of ourselves. Better get back to where you belong before your pieces run out.

name: Squeen's Adventure
description: After Squeen's beloved spaceship suffers a oil leak, Squeen loses control and crash lands onto Earth. Now while that wouldn't be so bad on its own, Squeen also realizes that his phone's battery is low! Help Squeen in finding parts to repair his ship so he can get back to his home planet and charge his phone!

name: Long Starlight
description: Long Starlight is a Snake clone based on the My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic character Starlight Glimmer.

name: Discard: A Memory Game
description:
Discard is a fun memory game with a twist.

You have 3 seconds to memorise a selection of playing cards. When ready, tap the right cards to advance to the next level. As the rounds progress, the difficulty will also increase.

name: Eli
description: A small Bullet hell about shooting demons.

name: Radio Commander: Squad Management
description: Get closer to your men and make the Vietnam War even more personal. Learn your subordinates' stories and backgrounds from an illustrated glossary. Keep your men alive so they gain experience, perks and awards, that influence your platoons' stats. Promote, enlist and discharge.

name: Rocket Rabbit - Coin Race
description: Help Rocket Rabbit race through the hills and tunnels chasing after coins! Go upside down in the rabbit tunnels and defy gravity! Jump to avoid the other running rabbits, sleeping turtles, crawling spiders and climbing groundhogs! Or jump on top of them to earn extra coins! Use coins to buy powerups that will help you last longer and race further! Use cool powerups like invincibility, slo-mo and super speed to enhance your gameplay! Rocket Rabbit is endless racing fun for the entire family!

name: RMX Real Motocross
description: Take part in exciting motocross racing - race on different tracks. Upgrade your bike to score higher place. After each race remember to Fix broken parts and upgrade your motorcycle to win! Learn tricks, earn money, and win every championship.

name: Misplaced
description: Misplaced is an action platformer released by Harambert on itch.

name: Waifu Uncovered
description: Eight beautiful maidens are under threat of alien attack. Their lives and the fate of the world now rest in your hands. In this simple yet rewarding shoot'em up, take command of multiple ship types, each balanced for a different play style, and blast away clothing that’s been deeply infected by a deadly virus. Evade and destroy enemies as they feverishly work against you, team up in multiplayer or bravely battle alone, save the girl of your dreams and perhaps even unlock a convenient one-finger mode.

name: A Buttload of Free Games
description:
Overview
One free game is good, but do you know what's better than just one free game? A Buttload of Free Games! And now they're all wrapped together in this convenient launcher!

A Buttload of Free Games is a minigame collection featuring over 100 small games with more added often! Slash slimes and match colors in Super Slime Slasher Ultra, wrangle pesky Squares in Sqaranch!, toot while you can in Tooting in the Rain and so much more! Set highscores, play with friends and try and play all the games!

name: Meditation 5
description:
Meditation 5 is a minimalist game about balance, concentration and strategy inspired by Taoist philosophy. The goal is to prevent the screen from turning red by shooting abstract enemies with two crosshairs simultaniously. Constant demand for concentration without much distraction pulls you into a meditative flow. Since the difficulty increases the longer you play, you may need to sacrifice advancement to get yourself some air.

How long can you prevail? Improve your abilites and find strategies to go for the highest score on three difficulty Levels. Full controller support, including XINPUT and Dualshock devices.

name: Gunpig: Firepower For Hire
description: Join alien pest control specialist and possibly shortest merc in the galaxy Bax as he fights to clear Stalwart Academy, a school space station, from a rogue horde of robot space monsters!

name: The Alabaster Donut Farm
description: Welcome to the first alabaster donut farm! Take a tour and make yourself right at home.

name: Final Fantasy VII Remake: Deluxe Edition
description:
A spectacular re-imagining of one of the most visionary games ever, FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE rebuilds and expands the legendary RPG for today. The first game in this project is set in the eclectic city of Midgar and presents a fully standalone gaming experience.

Deluxe Edition Includes:
- FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE game
- Art Book
- Mini-Soundtrack
- Steelbook Case
- Cactuar Summon Materia DLC

name: Shadow Gangs
description:
Shadow Gangs is an arcade style ninja action game.
The graphics are HD hand drawn and traditional style animated.
The soundtrack was made by a lead guitarist over a 5 years period.
You play the role of Dan the current ninja order master.
Your mission is to rescue your family from the Shadow Force crime organisation, whose members are known as the Shadow Gangs. Use your ninja transformation ability and your special powers.

name: Group Project Simulator
description: In a group project with a colorful cast of characters, Yu must try to get that A. Fail at scheduling group meetings, stop group members from procrastinating, and maybe adopt a cat.

name: Madness Fantasy
description: Five friends leave for a crazy weekend, but end up arrested. Now to get clear, they will have to infiltrate a dangerous criminal organization and take on crazy missions. Will you succeed in take them out of this mess?

name: The Adventures of Spunk Dodgers and Splat
description: The Adventures of Spunk Dodgers and Splat is a 2D auto-scrolling platformer featuring fast action and hilarious quips. Jump to avoid enemies and obstacles while collecting coins on the way to completing over 50 thrilling levels.

name: Nevertales: Hearthbridge Cabinet - Collector's Edition
description: Can you live up to your family’s legacy in time?

name: Spacen: The Beginning
description: As Gary Rogers, the player battles through hordes of enemy spaceships in several missions, evading projectiles, asteroids and defeating powerful bosses. Gary collects debris from destroyed enemies and exchanges them at the home base for ship and weapon upgrades.

name: Pivo
description: Pivo is a game that solves puzzles between 2D space and 3D space. Experience transcending space with a cute corgi.

name: Nameless Cat
description: Embark on a journey as a cat to search for a way to return to your owner!

name: Farstar: Exodus
description: Influenced by table-top and RTS PC games, Farstar: Exodus brings much depth to the genre, and is the only online card game that allows players to trade cards with each other in real-time.

name: Scrappers
description:
Scrappers is a game in which up to 4 players work together to collect garbage.

In the not too distant future, the robot team Scrappers collects trash in a city full of trash.

Collaborate with your friends to pick up trash, throw it, stack it and load it on the truck!

Garbage collection work is full of danger! Rival robots attack Scrappers aiming at garbage. It's up to you how to get through garbage collection and elimination of rivals!

Maximize your garbage collection efficiency and receive higher rewards depending on your teamwork.

Use your rewards to unlock new characters and customized parts!

This title was delisted form Apple Arcade n 2023 with the multiplatform release of PixelJunk Scrappers Deluxe

name: Unchained
description: Play as Jake in the fight against Vitron, a company with a plan to enslave humanity. Through a carefully crafted story-line with over 10 side missions, you will find yourself in a heated battle to take down the CEO of an evil corporation.

name: Pokémon Clover
description:
Pokémon Clover is a ROM Hack of Pokémon Fire Red featuring the two brand new regions of Fochun and the Ebin Isles, as well as 386 original fakemon!
Started in late 2014 as a janky rehash of Pokémon Fire Red, Pokémon Clover has since evolved into a complete overhaul with all-new characters, story, maps, music and gameplay mechanics.
The main point of Clover is to be both a parody of 4chan’s imageboard culture as well as a parody of Pokémon as a whole. It thus contains themes and language not suited for the faint of heart.
The current version of Clover has been in the works for over 4 whole years with effort worth thousands of hours by over 40 contributors, and with an estimated play time of over 100 hours, Clover is sure to bring you moments filled with joy, frustration, laughter and suffering!

name: Pixie Moon
description: The Ominous Pixie Moon is here and in its view, a tyrannical view of earth.Fire your deadly moonbeams at the planet whilst fending off the likes of missiles, rockets and lunar missions that are hoping to put a stop to this madness.This is the event of the century, be there or be vaporised horribly.

name: Skin Stealers
description: Naughty skeletons want to steal your skin for unknown purposes, perhaps as a fashion accessory or at the nearest black market, so what do you do? Slap their hands away of course! Its time to save your own skin and perhaps your credibility amongst the fashion savvy undead.

name: Gamedev Beatdown
description:
Live through the life of a developer in Gamedev Beatdown.

Have you ever wondered what goes behind the scenes of games that you love or whose names you never got to hear?

Have you ever been in a meeting that felt more like a war room? With the loudest voice winning arguments and deciding what decision gets implemented?

Play as a member of a team, making some hard and some not so hard decisions. If you win, your choices get implemented. Lose, and your game and studio might head in a direction you did not sign up for.

Work your way up from arcade-style games to full-fledged AAA releases. Once you start your journey as an Indie developer, move to new studio locations and hire the right people as you work your way up in the industry. There's a lot to handle, but you've got this. It was your dream, after all.

Did we tell you how Game Development wasn't easy?

Features
Procedural rogue-lite progression.
Persistent stress tolerance (health) between projects. Think long term instead of battle to battle.
Move to different locations that unlock some unique games to develop.
Fight over real, real-adjacent, and a few entirely fabricated day-to-day problems game developers face.

name: Loathe the Game
description: The Devil has a new minion! Condem sinners to hell all with the flick of the spacebar.Collect souls to power your soul meter and unlock evil upgrades to spawn more minions along the way.Each goal is something special to make the autoclicking expierience worthwhile and satisfying.This is one game that you surely want to miss.

name: Big Bears Bad Advice: A Non-Biased Daily Fortune Teller
description: Do you wish to know your inevitable future? Perhaps if you stub your toe tomorrow to be exact? Well then Big Bears Bad Advice is for you! (Caution: May only be accurate 1/9th of the time) Big bear knows all! Big bear knows most... perhaps less than he lets on with his subversive list of somewhat plausible predictions.

name: Deep, In the Forest
description: Game is deck building roguelite card game with RPG elements. Save the forest kingdom from the oppression of the Mad King. The game is developed by a small team of two people - fans of the genre. We want to create our own unique game and we hope you like it!

name: Cross Country Express - An Oddfellows Mini
description: Cross America in a wild goose chase to collect your flock before the annual farm pageant. Leap across a seemingly never-ending assortment of fences, barrels and trees in a deceptively simple runner game. And whatever you do, dont trip.

name: DragonClash
description: In DragonClash, you control a mighty beast of legend, raising a dragon from hatchling to elder wyrm. Become the dragon and conquer all that oppose you in this exciting, single-player card game of strategic dragon combat.

name: Cover Sky
description: Robots launched an attack on humans! You must stop them! "Cover Sky" is a fast-paced (small map) single-player shooting game that can switch between first and third person perspective at any time. It features fast start, end in fifteen minutes, customizable AI count(20 , 30, 40), dynamic environment, and multiple weapons.

name: Heal
description: Guide an old man through the dark and atmospheric world of Heal in this abstract 2D puzzle-adventure point-and-click game.

name: Final Fantasy VII Remake: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
A spectacular re-imagining of one of the most visionary games ever, FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE rebuilds and expands the legendary RPG for today. The first game in this project is set in the eclectic city of Midgar and presents a fully standalone gaming experience.

Deluxe Edition Includes:
- FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE game
- Digital Art Book
- Mini-Soundtrack
- Cactuar Summon Materia DLC

name: Dark Hero Party
description: Imos lives his peaceful life helping his sister Tori run a potion shop in a quiet village. However, when an order is given for all Ryuujin to hunt down the Evil King, that peace is shattered forever.

name: Astrela Starlight
description: Astrela Starlight is an adventure game where the player can explore, interact with various NPCs, complete quests, mine and refine materials, then build new spacecraft and space stations.

name: Meeple Station
description: Meeple Station is a cooperative Space station Simulation game. Strongly inspired by Dwarf Fortress and Rimworld (with a hint of Space Station 13). Where the complexity of a simulation game blends with the friendly and satisfying nature of a Real-Time-Strategy game.

name: Dungeon Shooter
description: Switch through various weapons and take down foes! Thrilling top-down shooting!

name: Startup Company
description: Startup Company is a business simulation sandbox game. You play as the CEO of a newly formed software company. Your job is to either complete client contracts to make money, or build your very own products.

name: Final Fantasy VII Remake
description: A spectacular re-imagining of one of the most visionary games ever, Final Fantasy VII Remake rebuilds and expands the legendary RPG for today. The first game in this project is set in the eclectic city of Midgar and presents a fully standalone gaming experience.

name: The Presidential Turnabout
description: You play as Apollo, with Trucy as your ever-loyal sidekick. As with most people, the JFK case has always lurked at the back of your mind since childhood, but you’ve never taken a real interest in resolving it until now. But when an innocent trip to a space museum takes a dangerous turn and spirals into a nightmarish adventure of time travel and lawbreaking, you are forced to journey back to the fateful day of John Kennedy’s murder, and find yourself defending the most notorious assassin (or fall guy!) in history, Lee Harvey Oswald. As you hunt around the now world-famous crime scene, desperately looking for some clue or scrap of evidence that everyone else might have overlooked, you slowly become more and more unnerved at the steady trickle of evidence that…….just doesn’t make sense. Your client is clearly not telling you everything he knows, but is he the only one with a skeleton in his closet? Just how many of your own preconceived notions on this case will you have to take another look at? Will you be able to uncover the truth in time, and save your client from his historical date with destiny? Or will you be forced to watch powerlessly, as the inevitable sequence of known events unfolds before your eyes?

description: Sin descripción

name: Sporcle Party
description: From Sporcle, the world's largest trivia company, comes Sporcle Party. Challenge friends to topics from movies, geography, sports, literature, history and so much more. OR make your own pack. Perfect for office parties, classroom fun, baby showers and playing with friends - in person or virtually.

name: Super Metroid: Y-Faster 2 Fast
description:
So why faster? Because you should.
Just like its predecessor, this is a speedrun/race hack but much more ambitious.

Defeat 5 main bosses in 5 distinct areas then head to the final boss as fast as possible.
Each area can be completed in one run and in any order (no need to go back and forth between areas to progress).
Once the main boss is defeated, you must rush to the next area.
You don't have any time to spare as you usually do in most exploration oriented hacks as you instantly die when the timer reaches zero.
If you exit an area before beating the main boss, you're doing it wrong.

In case you're confused, look at the map - all area maps are available from the start.
The game is designed for veterans in mind and a few techniques may be required depending on your current equipment (mid-air morphing, crouch jumping, double bomb jumping, etc.) - nothing on TAS level rest assured.
Areas feature varying degree of difficulty, if you keep dying or make slow progress, maybe start over with another area first - some areas are brutal when underequipped.
There is a good chance that it will take you a few tries before completing the game under the time limit.
From the knowledge you gathered from your runs, try different routes and find the fastest one overall.

description: Welcome to the scenic mountain area known as Blood River Base! This WAD was made in under 64KB and will work in vanilla DOOM II. Traverse large canyons and destroy Hell's legions as the dangerous Blood River flows beneath.

description: Pudding takes a commute and chats with a passenger. There are three endings.

name: Burnin' Rubber 5 Air
description:
Burnin' Rubber 5 Air is a lite version of the original game which was released on April 9, 2020.

The player is supposed to complete many different challenges. Due to the game being a splitscreen multiplayer game, the player has to find other players to play the game with.

The player starts with your first four cars: the A7, Bullet 350, Rebel, Petite XS, and weapons like the Heavy Machine Gun or the Striker Launcher, but once it completes more challenges they can unlock more vehicles, such as the Mule, Macari, Vice and more.

And in terms of weapons, the player can unlock weapons such as the Mini Gun, Fuel Air Rocket Launcher, Shotgun and more.

The player must beat all the available campaign challenges, unlocking vehicles and earning money.

name: Fall of the Mafia
description: Fall Of The Mafia is a 2D action mafia game.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Canadian Rocky Mountains Viktor Lake to Ross Peak and Glacier
description: Drive through the Canadian Rocky Mountains between Viktor Lake, through the famous CPR McDonald and Connaught tunnels, to Ross Peak and Glacier.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Tidewater Point Railroad 2.0
description: Tidewater Railroad is a shortline railroad running from a crude oil terminal located south by the river to an intermodal terminal in the North.

name: Solitaire Deluxe Bundle: 3 in 1
description: All the classic game modes you know and love! Challenge yourself and enjoy countless hours of fun with the most popular solitaire games: Klondike, Freecell and Spider! Change the game's appearance to suit your own taste. Progress through the game to unlock unique card sets and backgrounds. Customize your Solitare to make it unique and exclusive. Stunning animations and gameplay designed for endless entertainment in the palm of your hand.

name: Kuso
description: kuso is a challenging yet fair platformer with a simple aesthetic. You have the ability to run, jump, and leave your own checkpoint. Make your way through acid, long jumps, disappearing platforms, bouncers, giant saws, and much more in this dreadful mechanical world. If you're looking for a game that'll challenge your platforming skills, something excellent to listen to, and a game to master, kuso is the game for you. Features: • 41 Unique Levels • 26 Unlockable Achievements • 2 Player Local Race Mode, perfect for Tabletop or TV Mode • A soundtrack composed by James Bennett with music crafted for each level • Hidden secrets and collectibles to find • A dedicated Speedrun Mode for individual levels or level sets with stat breakdowns for easy screenshot sharing

name: Pokémon FireRed: Rocket Edition
description:
Play as a member of Team Rocket!

In Pokémon FireRed: Rocket Edition, you will cheat, lie and steal your way to the top as you engage with the thriving gang scene of the Kanto region. Featuring a story that takes place at the same time as the original FireRed, Rocket Edition will play with your expectations and allow you to experience the classic story from a whole new perspective. Along your journey, you will unravel secret conspiracies, explore a side of Kanto you’ve never seen before, engage with familiar characters in unfamiliar situations – and, most importantly: steal their Pokémon!

name: Code: D-Blood
description: "Code: D-Blood" is a next-generation RPG mobile game developed by Zulong Entertainment. The game production team is assembled and deeply participated by the top engine manufacturer Epic Games. The UE4 engine technology capability is maximized to create a gorgeous and multi-national scene for this mysterious masterpiece. In the game, there are rich environmental changes such as day and night, rainy weather, etc., giving players a real feeling of being in the real world.

name: Echoes of Aeons
description: At the edge of the Universe the Aeons set about to create and to destroy. What was left in the wake was the children of Terra, unified and prosperous... Until the breaking of the world. Follow Rinelesca "Rin" Stellaris, The daughter heir to the throne of Lusec, as she is caught in the midst of a brewing war, after celebrating centuries of peace in her home nation. As tensions rise, Rin sets out on her own to figure out the cause of the goings on in Terra. As she inches closer to uncovering the truth, what she thought was myth slowly becomes reality. And Eldric Estellion A young man orphaned in his youth, unbeknownst to him, he is one of the Descended. A fabled people born of mortal and Aeonic blood. Thrown into a world beyond possibility, Eldric must find the courage to face his deepest fears. Is it destiny or choice in which one’s life is framed? A tale of two souls, bound together by fate, as they challenge destiny in an epic tale of time and space, love, laughter, the human condition and those who seek to destroy existence.

name: Music Ball
description: The "MusicBall" game, fun music arcade game with many levels. Thanks to carefully selected music and addictive gameplay, the developers managed to achieve an incredible experience for the players!

name: A Sunny Day in Lockdown
description: A sketch of a spring day in self-isolation.

name: BackFire

name: Love Hues!
description: Love Hues! is a university-based visual novel packed with both character and world secrets. You'll be playing as Skyler (changeable name and pronouns) and navigate your first few months at Falls West University, where you'll meet 5 romanceable - or befriendable! - characters who hide certain truths about themselves and the world around them.

name: One Punch Man: A Hero Nobody Knows DLC Pack 1 - Suiryu
description:
Play as Suiryu, user of the Dark Body Arts, in ONE PUNCH MAN: A HERO NOBODY KNOWS!
This pack also includes an original story for Suiryu.

Contents:
- Additional playable character: Suiryu
- Original Suiryu story
- Avatar Parts
- A Killer Move for your avatar

name: Bastard Little Zombie
description:
Bastard Little Zombie is an impossible Platformer/Puzzle/Trial-And-Error game, one of the hardest and most challenging indie platformer you'll play.
It's going to be very tough to keep going and the road to take won't always be so obvious... Will you make it?

name: BlindBlade II
description: BlindBlade II is a sequel to the first-generation product. In this generation, the game has 21 extremely difficult levels. Players can only pass all the challenges if they stay focused and brave and persevering like a real samurai.

description: I don’t remember how I got into this house. I only know that I need to quickly find a way out. Something terrible is walking around the house and looking for me.

name: AFL Evolution 2

THE EVOLUTION CONTINUES!
AFL Evolution 2 is taking AFL gaming to new heights with more features than ever before!

name: Hooplord
description: Hooplord is a labor of love that combines boss battles and basketball into a hybrid VR experience that's unlike anything you've ever seen or played before.

name: Race Maniacs
description: Take part in crazy races, where all the turns on the tracks at a right angle!

name: Wanderlust: Transsiberian
description: Board the Trans-Siberian railroad and travel 9,289 km from Moscow to Vladivostok. Clash with a vibrant culture as you meet people as strange to you as you are to them. Journey into a standalone Wanderlust adventure from the makers of The Witcher.

name: Go Kart Run!
description: Aim for 1st place! Collect and customize 20 drivers, race to increase your rank, make a comeback with food items and go insanely fast with 5 engine options!

name: Warp Factor

name: Blackstone Academy for the Magical Arts
description: Fly high, make magic, and pass midterms at a mysterious academy of magic! Which faction will you help shape the future of the magical world? Blackstone Academy is a magical academy for students with supernatural talents.

name: Plebby Quest: The Crusades
description: Survive ambitious rulers dreaming of an empire, outsmart treacherous neighbors longing to burn your spoils, and navigate the religion’s predictably unreasonable demands; you need ask only one question as you build your legacy – “Will you burn them, or be burnt?

name: Ironlights
description: Ironlights is a VR dueling game with skillful, fluid melee combat. Parry, block, and strike down your opponents using a variety of physics-based weapons. Test your skills in multiplayer battles, or fight to the top of the league in the huge single-player campaign!

name: Bombergeddon
description: Bombergeddon is a high-level strategic simulation of Nuclear War between the USA and USSR during the pre-ICBM period (1950s). Take control of the bomber fleets of either the USA or USSR and try to inflict the highest percentage of casualties in the enemy's top 50 cities. Your country's survival is in your hands.

name: Mask of Mists
description: Mask of Mists is an action-adventure game in a first-person view in which you are immersed in exploring the world full of magic and dangers!
